title: Miraculous X-Ray Vision - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Eye Powers   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Psychic Powers
author: Xiaoyao   小妖
description:
Zhang Jun, a loafer, accidentally gets the miraculous power of X-Ray Vision and stumbles across the Campus Queen, Lin Xian, on his way to the wedding of the Class Queen, Ye Qian, who once rejected him.

He then follows Lin Xian to gamble on stones and learns to better control the miraculous superpower.

Success, even with superpowers, is by no means easy. Trouble comes when Zhang Jun gets too close to Lin Xian. How will he, a nobody, with his X-Ray Vision, get rid of all obstacles along the way, control his power, and rise to the pinnacle of his life?>
